description:
While running an errand for Nagi, Hayate is attacked by Gilbert piloting a robot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Took 29 Minutes to Deliver, So Please Pay the Amount We Had Originally Asked For... Is an Old Myth Now
Otodoke made 29-fun Deshita no de, Kitei Toori no Ryoukin de Oshiharai Onegaishimasu...wa, Tooi Zenseiki no Hanashi
お届けまで29分でしたので, 規定通りの料金でお支払いお願いします...... は, 遠い前世紀の話
